title: Air Canada (TSX:AC) Stock Just Soared 55%: Should You Buy the Bounce? - The Motley Fool Canada
description: Air Canada stock (TSX:AC)(TSX:AC.B) is hot again, as investors chase it on the way up, but should you buy now or wait for a pullback?
